data.title: After Life on Netflix cast: Who is in the cast of After Life?
data.meta_description: AFTER LIFE is the brand new comedy series from Ricky Gervais streaming on Netflix now but who is in the cast of After Life? Here’s everything you need to know.
data.text:
Who is in the cast of After Life?

Tony - Ricky Gervais

Ricky Gervais stars as the main character in After Life, Tony.

Gervais also created, wrote and directed each episode of After Life.

He is best known as playing David Brent in The UK Office and Andy Millman in Extras.

Gervais is also a stand-up comedian, writer, producer and director.

Gervais is the owner of seven BAFTA Awards, five British Comedy Awards, two Emmy Awards and three Golden Globe Awards.

Lisa - Kerry Godliman

Kerry Godliman stars as Tony’s wife, Lisa in After Life.

Sadly, Lisa’s passes away at the beginning of After Life and as a result, Tony considers ending his life.

However, he has a moment of realisation and decides to continue to live his life by doing and saying whatever he wants.

Godliman is a comedian and actress, best known for playing Hannah in Derek and Nicky Rawlings in Bad Move.

Other credits include Extras, Miranda and Home Time.

WHO DOES DIANE MORGAN PLAY IN AFTERLIFE?

Matt - Tom Basden

Tom Basden stars as Tony’s brother-in-law Matt in After Life.

The star has worked with Gervais before, starring alongside him in David Brent: Life on the Road.

Basden is an English actor and comedy writer, best known for starring and writing the ITV sitcom Plebs.

He is part of the four-man sketch group, Cowards which includes Tim Key, Stefan Golaszewski and Lloyd Woolf.

Lenny - Tony Way

Tony Way plays the role of Lenny, Tony’s best friend.

Way is best known for starring in numerous comedy series including Extras, Black Books and It’s Reeve and Mortimer.

He most recently starred as Plague in The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, as Dontos Hollard in Game of Thrones and Thomas Nashe in Anonymous.

WHERE IS AFTER LIFE FILMED AND WHERE IS IT SET?

Tony’s dad - David Bradley

David Bradley stars as Tony’s dad in After Life on Netflix.

Tony’s dad is unwell and is looked after by a nurse, played by Extras' star Ashley Jensen.

Bradley is best recognised for playing Walder Frey in Game of Thrones and Argus Filch in the Harry Potter film series.

The Nurse - Ashley Jensen

Ashley Jensen appears in After Life as the nurse who cares for Tony’s dad.

Jensen is a Scottish actress and narrator, best known for playing Maggie Jacobs in Extras.

She is also well recognised for her role as Christina McKinney in Ugly Betty.
